caption.title: Box plot displaying minimum, first quartile, second quartile (median), third quartile, maximum, and outliers of the production of NO achieved using different vaccination strategies.
caption.p: Production of NO by Leishmania infantum–infected macrophages obtained from hamsters vaccinated with KMPII, TRYP, LACK, and PAPLE22 in the form of raw extracts of Trichoplusia ni larvae producing recombinant proteins (PROT; n = 4), naked plasmid (DNA; n = 4), both vaccines combined in a prime-boost strategy (DNA-PROT; n = 4), and in control hamsters (C; n = 4). Each sample was analyzed in triplicate. (* P = 0.029).
